author: pbr
title: Simple but fun
review:
I build Mindstorms NXT robots as my hobby, and these little "posable" robot models are compelling to me.  I decided to build Asimo from stock I had on hand.  I found build instructions elsewhere, and found the inventory here. 

It took me about a half-hour to build the model, once I had figured out what color to make it.

Few of us have consistent "white" elements.  I don't, anyway.  Some are chalky white, others are almost beige, and yet others are very light grey.  So, instead of trying for white, I decided to build a blue Asimo, with some metallic grey chest-parts.

It turned out really nice.

The inventory here says the count is off by 4.  I figured out what 3 of the four are.  If you look at Asimo's head, he has four of the same element - 2 black, 2 white.  The inventory shows only two of those elements instead of four.  The other one I figured out is missing from the inventory is Asimo's "backpack".  I was able to construct something similar to it using a number of other elements.  I'm unsure what the fourth element is which is missing from the inventory.
